name: spo-request-pnp-reindex-user-profile
title: Request Reindex of SharePoint User Profile Properties
shortDescription: This function, Request-PnPReindexUserProfile, triggers a full crawl of each user's profile properties.

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample Request Reindex of SharePoint User Profile Properties

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
